name: Experience The Paris Only Locals Know!
description: Instead of taking the same cookie-cutter tour with hordes of other tourists, why not experience a private tour with a Paris insider? See the REAL Paris most visitors never find with their guidebooks. Explore the most interesting neighborhoods of Paris with Richard Nahem, a savvy ex-New Yorker who has lived in Paris for eight years and knows the city better than many native Parisians. Eye Prefer Paris focuses on showing you interesting, out-of-the way places and gives you a Parisian experience that leaves the amateurs behind!
